value:
My dear Julius... Is there nothing yet
left of my gentle brother?

Though we saved the world from the
ambitions of the Loptr Church, the
cost paid in lives was high...

Forgive my saying so, but you seem
exhausted... Please, get some rest.
I am here for you.

I have an uneasy feeling... Apologies,
but...would you mind if I stay near to
you today?

Ah, I was just admiring the flowers...
When we were young, my brother
and I would play in the flower beds...

Oh, hello. I seem to be lost. Is this not
$Nf's castle?

This new power flowing through me
bears a mysterious warmth...

I must have the strength to
command my fate!
What has happened to me...

For me? Thank you. I will use it to
aid others wherever I am needed.

I am Julia. You think me a...Legendary
Hero? I am not certain I understand,
but I am here to help nonetheless.

In the past, I've resented the crusader
blood flowing through my veins... Yet,
it gives me the strength to fight fate.$k$pNow I understand. In order to face
the great malice that threatens the
world, this strength is necessary.$k$pIt's like your ability to summon... But
I fear even still we will both face even
greater threats to overcome.$k$pThough I cannot take your place,
allow me to pray for you, that it
might bring us closer to peace...$k$pI pray the gods grant you protection,
gentle $Nu.
やぁっ
いきます
きゃああっ！
だめ…
This is my birthright!
I call on the divine light!
This feeling... This power...
I won't run.
My dear brother...
ふふっ
I am Julia. You truly think me a legendary Hero?
Oh! My apologies. I was lost in thought.
Oh, I'm all right. I'm not so lonely.
I will not run. No matter how difficult a trial I face.
There's something about you... When I'm with you, I feel relaxed. At peace.
Lord Seliph, my dear brother... He is the light that the people have longed for.
No matter what comes, I will stay by your side. I promise.
I understand.
Oh! Uh, what?
I will do what I can.
